data.title: How to pronounce Pujols? (RECOMMENDED)
data.meta_description: How do you say Pujols? Learn how Pujols is pronounced in different countries and languages with audio and phonetic spellings along with additional information, such as, type of name, other spellings, meaning
data.text:
Pujols is NOT a Spanish name; it is Catalan. Yes, I realize the most famous person with this name pronounces it "Poo Holes", but almost everyone else with the name pronounces it with its Catalan pronunciation.

poo jols

(note:The 'j' is pronounced similar to the French 'J' midway between the English pronunciation and an 'sh' sound. The 'L' is pronounced with the tongue further back in the mouth than in English.

Pujols is NOT a Spanish name; it is Catalan. Yes, I realize the most famous person with this name pronounces it "Poo Holes", but almost everyone else with the name pronounces it with its Catalan pronunciation.
